text: Kɨ Kraisɨn adarazir mav gɨfozɨ, God fomɨra, 14 plan azenibar faragha, a inigha ghua namba 3 overiamɨn ghuavanabogha Godɨn Nguibamɨn oto. Kɨ fozir puvatɨ, a ti uan nivafɨzim sara ghu, o a uan nivafɨzim ategha duamɨn ghu. God uabɨra bizir kam gɨfo.(12:2) Akar kam “Kraisɨn adarazir mav,” kar ti Pol uabɨ. Ves 7ɨn gan.
